DBScript.name: FORMULARY_QUERY_ALL
DBScript.Content: SELECT * FROM (SELECT FormularyID, Active, Billnum, CommonName, BrandName, Form, DEA_Class, Barcode, UnitCost, AllergyDrug, VendorCode, SiteID FROM T_FORMULARY ) AS T ORDER BY T.FormularyID OFFSET @Offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY

DBScript.name: FORMULARY_QUERY_BY_FORM
DBScript.Content: SELECT * FROM (SELECT FormularyID, Active, Billnum, CommonName, BrandName, Form, DEA_Class, Barcode, UnitCost, AllergyDrug, VendorCode, SiteID FROM T_FORMULARY ) AS T WHERE Form=@Form ORDER BY T.FormularyID OFFSET @Offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY
